fields.name: project
fields.label: Project Name
fields.description: The name of your Axosoft project. It must be a unique value.

fields.name: itemType
fields.label: Item Type
fields.description: The type of item to be created. These are the default values, you might have renamed them.

fields.name: clientid
fields.label: Axosoft Private Client Id
fields.description: You can find this value in Axosoft->Tools->System Options->Axosoft API Settings

fields.name: clientsecret
fields.label: Axosoft Private Client Secret
fields.description: You can find this value in Axosoft->Tools->System Options->Axosoft API Settings

fields.name: username
fields.label: Login ID
fields.description: Your Axosoft login (your email address, by default)
